	var temp_Name = 'di-branded-landing-template';
	var isTempSite = false;        
	var sc_secondLevel = "Industry";
	var sc_thirdLevel = 'Government_&_Public_Services';
	var sc_country = 'us';
	var sc_language = 'en';
	var siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'industry';	
	var sc_mfCountry = '';
	var sc_GatedOverlayEnabled = 'false';
	var sc_mfSite = 'Deloitte';
	var sc_gigyaId = "";
	
	if(siteSectionOverrideVal.length > 0 && (siteSectionOverrideVal.toUpperCase().trim() == 'NA')){
		siteOverrideValueProp5='';
	}else if((siteSectionOverrideVal.length > 0 && siteSectionOverrideVal.toUpperCase().trim() != 'NA')){
		siteOverrideValueProp5 = siteSectionOverrideVal.toLowerCase().trim();
	}else if(siteSectionOverrideVal.length == 0){
		if(temp_Name == 'genericerrorpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = '404_error';
		}
		else if(temp_Name == 'nonsupportedpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'not_supported';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'rfpformpage') || (temp_Name == 'contactuspage')|| (temp_Name == 'deloitteformstemplate')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'forms';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'searchResultsTemplate') || (temp_Name == 'internalSearchResultsTemplate')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'search_results';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'officedetailspage') || (temp_Name == 'officelocatorpage')|| (temp_Name == 'globalofficedirectorypage')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'office_information';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'companyinformationpage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'legal';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'moreondeloittepage'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'company_information';
		}else if(temp_Name == 'pressreleasespagetemplate'){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'press_releases';
		}else if((temp_Name == 'fulltopicpage') || (temp_Name == 'articlepage')|| (temp_Name == 'solutionpage')|| (temp_Name == 'eventpage')|| (temp_Name == 'careerpage')){
			siteOverrideValueProp5 ='industry';
		}else if(temp_Name == "memberfirmhomepage" || temp_Name == "globalhomepage") {              
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'home';
		}else if(temp_Name == "thankyoupage") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'thank_you';
		}else if(temp_Name == "dynamiclisttemplate") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'dynamiclist';
		}else if(temp_Name == "htmlfragmentpage") {
			siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'landingpage';
		}else if(temp_Name == "blog-collection-template") {
            siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'blog_collection';
        }else if(temp_Name == "blog-post-template") {
            siteOverrideValueProp5 = 'blog-post';
		}
	}       

	if(temp_Name == "memberfirmhomepage" || temp_Name == "globalhomepage") {
		 sc_channel = 'Homepage';
	} else if(temp_Name == "thankyoupage") {
	   sc_channel = 'Thankyou';
	}
	sc_secondLevelForProp5 = siteOverrideValueProp5;
	searchLocation = '//www2.deloitte.com/us/en/misc/search.html';

	try{

			sc_gigyaId=sessionStorage.getItem("gigyaIdInSession");
   		 }
	}
	catch(err){console.log(err);}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	 function loadScript(scriptURL){
        // load script
        var scriptTAG = document.createElement('script');
        scriptTAG.type = 'application/javascript';
        scriptTAG.async = true;
        scriptTAG.src = scriptURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(scriptTAG);
      }

      function loadCSS(CSSURL){
        // load css
        var linkTAG = document.createElement('link');
        linkTAG.rel = "stylesheet";
        linkTAG.type = 'text/css';
        linkTAG.href = CSSURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(linkTAG);
      }
      if(!navigator.onLine){
      	loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.css');
        loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site.min.css');
        loadScript('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-base.min.js');
      	templateType = dataLayer.page.attributes.pageTemplate;
        // for event details template
      	if(templateType == "Event_Details_Page_Template"){
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-event-details.min.css');
      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-event-details.min.css');
      	}
        // for blog post template

      		loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/shared/clientlibs/clientlib-site/templates/clientlib-site-blog-post.min.css')
      	}
        // for DI Article and multimedia
        else if(templateType == "Deloitte_Insights_Article_And_Multimedia_Template"){
          loadCSS('/etc.clientlibs/deloitte-insights/clientlibs/clientlib-critical/clientlib-critical-di-insights-and-multimedia.min.css');

class="banner-content"><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><p class="font-family-open font-52 font-weight-light lh-60 banner-title">The Way Ahead for States</p></div><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><p class="font-family-open font-28 font-weight-bold lh-30 banner-subTitle">A collection of policy briefs for 2022</p></div><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><p class="font-family-open font-16 font-weight-400 lh-24 banner-text">The pandemic created massive disruption for state governmentand presented opportunities for new ways of operating. With significant federal funds flowing in many areas, the spotlight is on state governments to set a course for the future.</p></div><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><div data-analytics-label="Banner:Explore" class="explore-btn font-family-open font-16 font-weight-bold">EXPLORE <img src="https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/insights/us/USI-dev/2022/july/way-ahead/static/media/arrow-up.a074375d.svg" alt="arrow"></div></div></div><div class="banner-imageContainer"><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><div class="banner-image"></div></div></div></div></section><div class="mobile-sticky-nav"><div class="nav-text"><p class="font-family-open font-14 lh-20 no-margin font-weight-bold"> Title of article</p></div><div class="nav-button" data-analytics-label="Introduction:Menu-open"><img src="https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/insights/us/USI-dev/2022/july/way-ahead/static/media/menu.ec805074.svg" alt="menu"></div></div><section id="introduction"><div id="intro" style="margin-top: 630px;"><div class="intro"><div class="intro-container"><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><p class="font-family-open font-30 lh-36 font-weight-light">Explore the four themes impacting states</p></div><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light">The path forward begins now. The Way Ahead for States is a collection of policy briefs on some of the most critical topics states are facing today grouped into four themes.</p><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light">From human services to infrastructure, state governments have significant federal resources to invest in projects that meet citizen needs. At the same time, states must deal with lingering issues from the pandemic, in areas such as public health, technology and data, and program integrity.</p><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light">Many states will be holding elections in 2022, providing a chance to refocus priorities for incumbents and newcomers alike. The Way Ahead is a compendium that provides insight into key themes surrounding top-of-mind policy issues.</p></div><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s; opacity: 0;"><div class="intro-cards"><div class="intro-card" data-analytics-label="Explore-the-four-themes:Pressing-challenges"><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light"> <span class="lh-20 font-20 font-weight-bold text-uppercase">Coming soon</span> <br> <span class="font-24 lh-24 font-weight-light">Pressing challenges</span> <br> <span class=""> Making the best use of federal funds to enhance broadband access, address climate resiliency, and improve infrastructure.</span></p></div><div class="intro-card" data-analytics-label="Explore-the-four-themes:Technology-shifts"><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light"> <span class="lh-20 font-20 font-weight-bold text-uppercase">Coming soon</span> <br> <span class="font-24 lh-24 font-weight-light">Technology shifts</span> <br> <span class="">Offer the chance to advance digital transformation and reduce costs. But there are concerns around data ethics, privacy breaches, and growing cybersecurity threats.</span></p></div><div class="intro-card" data-analytics-label="Explore-the-four-themes:Skills-for-success"><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light"> <span class="lh-20 font-20 font-weight-bold text-uppercase">Coming soon</span> <br> <span class="font-24 lh-24 font-weight-light">Skills for success</span> <br> <span class=""> Ensuring that the state workforce, the labor force, and higher education are preparing skills for the challenges ahead.</span></p></div><div class="intro-card" data-analytics-label="Explore-the-four-themes:Health-and-social-services"><p class="font-family-open font-16 lh-24 font-weight-light"> <span class="lh-20 font-20 font-weight-bold text-uppercase">Coming soon</span> <br> <span class="font-24 lh-24 font-weight-light">Health and social services </span> <br> <span class=""> Explores agency specific opportunities for improvement including public health infrastructure, health care, and human services.</span></p></div></div></div></div></div></div></section><section id="industry"><div class="industry-container"><section><div id="industry-0" class="industry-content"><div class="animate__animated" style="animation-duration: 1s;     function getCookie(name) 
    {
        var dc = document.cookie;
        var prefix = name + "=";
        var begin = dc.indexOf("; " + prefix);
        if (begin == -1) {
            begin = dc.indexOf(prefix);
            if (begin != 0) return null;
        }
        else
        {
            begin += 2;
            var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", begin);
            if (end == -1) {
                end = dc.length;
            }
        }
        return unescape(dc.substring(begin + prefix.length, end));
    }

var apiCallFunction = function () {

    var cacheBustDate = new Date();
    var dmdburl = "//api.company-target.com/api/v2/ip.json?key=M65mmM3vaL3giOy4cNEWnOAuvqHh83eUMjTyVFvM&x=" +

        url: dmdburl,
        dataType: "jsonp",
        timeout: 5000,
        success: function (dmdbResult) {
            dmdbDtmData = dmdbResult;
            //Add a signal to indicate that Demandbase was refreshed with this page load
            dmdbDtmData.cache = "false";
            if (typeof dmdbDtmData.company_name !== 'undefined') {

                //Now save to Session Storage
                try {
                    if (guid != null && guid != "" && guid != undefined) {
                        if (cookieCategories.indexOf(",2,") > -1) {
                            window.localStorage.setItem("dmdbDtm", JSON.stringify(dmdbDtmData));
                        }
                    } else window.localStorage.setItem("dmdbDtm", JSON.stringify(dmdbDtmData));
                } catch (err) {}



            }
            setVariables();
            //Update the Data Layer
            try {
                //console.log("in call");
                dmdDataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                //console.log("dmdDataLayer.dmd:",dmdDataLayer.dmd)
                dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;

            } catch (err) {
                if (err.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                    setTimeout(function () {
                        try {
                            dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                        } catch (error) {
                            if (error.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                                setTimeout(function () {
                                    try {
                                        dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                                    } catch (errorr) {
                                        if (errorr.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                                            setTimeout(function () {
                                                try {
                                                    dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                                                } catch (errorrr) {}
                                            }, 500);
                                        }
                                    }
                                }, 500);
                            }
                        }
                    }, 500);
                }
            }



            //Now save to Session Storage
            try {
                if (guid != null && guid != "" && guid != undefined) {
                    if (cookieCategories.indexOf(",2,") > -1) {
                        window.sessionStorage.setItem("dmdbDtm", JSON.stringify(dmdbDtmData));
                    }
                } else window.sessionStorage.setItem("dmdbDtm", JSON.stringify(dmdbDtmData));


            } catch (err) {}

        }
    });

}

                                                            dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                                                        } catch (e) {
                                                            if (e.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                                                                setTimeout(function () {
                                                                    try {
                                                                        dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                                                                    } catch (er) {}
                                                                }, 500);
                                                            }
                                                        }
                                                    }, 500);
                                                }
                                            }
                                        }, 100);
                                    }
                                }
                            }, 100)
                        };
                    }
                }, 500);
            }
        }
    } else if (window.sessionStorage.getItem("dmdbDtm")) {
        //this condition for someone who visits the site from home- to avoid multiple API calls in a session
        try {
            dmdbDtmData = JSON.parse(window.sessionStorage.getItem("dmdbDtm"));
            if (typeof dmdbDtmData.ip === 'undefined') {
                dmdbDtmData = '';
            } else {
                dmdbDtmData.cache = "true";

                setVariables();
                //console.log("in ss");
                dmdDataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;

                dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;


            }
        } catch (err) {
            if (err.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                setTimeout(function () {
                    try {
                        dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                    } catch (error) {
                        if (error.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                            setTimeout(function () {
                                try {
                                    dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                                } catch (errorr) {
                                    if (errorr.name == 'ReferenceError') {
                                        setTimeout(function () {
                                            try {
                                                dataLayer.dmd = dmdbDtmData;
                                            } catch (err) {}
                                        }, 500);
                                    }
                                }
                            }, 500);
                        }
                    }
                }, 500);
            }
        }
    }
} catch (error) {}


try {
    if (typeof dmdbDtmData === 'undefined' || dmdbDtmData === '' || (!window.sessionStorage.getItem("dmdbDtm"))) {
        if (window.jQuery) {
            apiCallFunction();
        } else {
            setTimeout(function () {
                if (window.jQuery) {
                    apiCallFunction();
                }
            }, 1000)
        }
    }
} catch (err) {
    if (err.name == "SecurityError") {
        apiCallFunction();
    }
}
</script></body></html>
